headline: ‘Woodstock’ for Christians: Revival Draws Thousands to Kentucky Town
snippet: Over two weeks, more than 50,000 people descended on a small campus chapel to experience the nation’s first major spiritual revival in decades — one driven by Gen Z.

headline: After Chemical Burn, Farm Owners Worry About a Cherished Way of Life
snippet: The derailment of a train carrying toxic chemicals upended a region of Ohio where generations of families could afford to buy acres of land, raise livestock and plant gardens.
abstract: The derailment of a train carrying toxic chemicals upended a region of Ohio where generations of families could afford to buy acres of land, raise livestock and plant gardens.
